mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET M_GOALDATE=SYSDATE WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT (ST_SUM+F_SUM+S_SUM) AS AC_MONEY FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SUM(ST_SUM) OVER(PARTITION BY ID) AS ST_SUM,ID FROM (SELECT ST_COUNT*ST_ADD AS ST_SUM, ID,ST_COUNT,ST_MONEY,ST_SEQ FROM STOCK WHERE ID=#{id}) ) ST JOIN (SELECT F_SUM,S_SUM,F.ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SUM(F_ADD) OVER(PARTITION BY ID) AS F_SUM,ID FROM FUND WHERE ID=#{id}) F JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SUM(S_ADD) OVER(PARTITION BY ID) AS S_SUM,ID FROM SAVE WHERE ID=#{id}) S ON F.ID=S.ID) SF ON SF.ID=ST.ID
SELECT ID,ST_SEQ,ST_NAME,ST_COUNT,ST_MONEY,ST_ADD,ST_BUYDATE,ST_MODIDATE,ST_SELLDATE,ST_SELLABLE,ST_MEMO FROM STOCK WHERE ID=#{id} AND ST_SELLABLE='N'
SELECT ID,F_SEQ,F_NAME,F_MONEY,F_ADD,F_BUYDATE,F_ENDDATE,F_MEMO FROM FUND WHERE ID=#{id} AND F_ENDABLE='N'
SELECT ID,L_SEQ,L_NAME,L_MONEY,L_REMANE,L_BAL,L_STARTDATE,L_ENDDATE,L_MEMO FROM LOAN WHERE ID=#{id} AND L_ENDABLE='N'
SELECT ID,S_SEQ,S_NAME,S_DETAIL,S_MONEY,S_ADD,S_TAX,S_COUNT,S_REGDATE,S_STARTDATE,S_ENDDATE,S_ENDABLE,S_MEMO FROM SAVE WHERE ID=#{id} AND S_ENDABLE='N'
